text:
@SenSchumer The coronavirus clowns are out in full force- ah, the bravado of the Truly Free, while the rest of us cower in darkness and ignorance because we don’t have True Faith or something something 1st & 2nd amendment rights argle bargle. 

But the virus doesn’t care about your beliefs.
